articles.author: Barry Svrluga
articles.title: Column | U.S. Olympic athletes expressing their views is as American as it gets - The Washington Post
articles.description: American athletes in Italy are trying to handle their response to questions about, well, being American, thoughtfully and carefully.
articles.content: CORTINA dAMPEZZO, Italy When Gus Kenworthy made the decision to express his feelings about the U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement agents by, well, urinating a profane message in the snow, he ha… [+189 chars]
